5.post_text: Launched at the 1975 Paris and London motor shows, here’s the first #Ferrari GT Berlinetta featuring a V8 engine: http://bit.ly/Ferrari70_FirstTime_8CylinderBerlinetta #Ferrari70

comments.message:
Still beautiful to this day.
Especially if clothed in 288GTO bodywork,  like mine!

My overall favorite automaker.  I own a 458 (soon a 488), Testarossa and Daytona.  There has only been one model that I didn't like, the Mondial.  The Ferrari has the best design of any sports-car today (IMO), and there has been only one other exotic (ever made) that looked a little nicer, the Countach.  The only color I own (and will ever own) is red.

Stunning machines...

This is a bit negative to say but i always thought they were a touch too small... very small wheel base, i really loved the 288 GTO.
One of the best looking Ferrari ever. Is perfect
The Magnum PI Ferrari where's my stick on moustache and Hawaiian Shirt 😊
The most beautiful automobile I've ever owned!
Was the love of my life, the apple of my eye 🙂
